mapper.select: select ot.code_transaction as codeTransaction, ot.ind_dine_in as indDineIn, (ot.recieved_amount - ot.change_amount) as totalAmount, ot.time_stamp as timeStamp from oms_transaction ot where ot.create_date between date(#{param1}) and date(#{param2})
select menu_item_name as menuItemName, menu_item_price as menuItemPrice from oms_transaction_order where code_transaction = #{code}
